item.title: 25/March - Basic knowledge of HTML
item.description: Preparations 1. Review exercises from Version Control with Git and GitHub (11/March) Reivew the content from the Git and GitHub lecture. We'll use github to store the HTML files we create in this lecture. Review Version Control with Git and GitHub: 11/March 2. Review exercises from Using an IDE (Integrated development environment) (18/March) Review the content from last lecture on Using an IDE with VsCode. We'll use VsCode to work on creating HTML files in this lecture.
